overview: One in a series of short films called "PSST!" Each short in the series brings together three filmmaking teams, and each must tell a story that picks up where the previous team left off. This storytelling technique is derived from the Dadaist game Exquisite Corpse and the childrenâ€™s game Telephone and applied to the arts of motion graphics, animation and filmmaking.
title: Omar Hot Pursuit S.E.A.R.C.H.
